member.name: CTL_ENTRY
member.summary: The CTL_ENTRY structure is an element of a certificate trust list (CTL).

member.name: CTL_ENTRY.SubjectIdentifier
member.summary: BLOB containing a unique identifier of a subject. It can be a hash or any unique byte sequence.

member.name: CTL_ENTRY.cAttribute
member.summary: Count of elements in the rgAttribute member array.

member.name: CTL_ENTRY.rgAttribute
member.summary: Array of structures, each holding information about the subject.
